name: MaFl_Donaris
oralText: Check in here to review the weekly results of the Guild Siege!
introText: Only the most cunning of guilds can hope to achieve victory in the Guild Sieges. Are you ready for the challenge?
byeText: Good luck to you! I hope I see you in ranking charts!

links.title: Who are you?
texts: Hello, it's very nice to meet you! I am the Reward Manager for the Guild Siege Center. I can reward prize money, return application fees, or even show you this week's ranking for the Guild Siege.

links.title: Goodbye!
texts: Good luck to you! I hope I see you in ranking charts!
